  • Type Parameters:

    public interface JooqErrorConverter<T extends java.lang.Throwable>
extends SQLErrorConverter
    Represents for SQL error maker that transforms SQL exception to jOOQ DataAccessException
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    DataAccessException
